text:
Hey SumUp team,

I'm the co-founder of Lunar Careers (https://lunarcareers.com/employers), an intelligent talent-matching platform for entrepreneurial companies, which aims to help bring your jobs in front of the right talent and vice-versa, by automatically matching interested and relevant candidates with your jobs based on skills, language, experience, education and more, as well as enabling and reminding your employees to refer their friends who would be well-suited for the position.

We're working with a number of companies in Berlin as part of our beta and would like to invite you and your team on board, for free until Q4, together with companies like Wayfair, Taxify and ResearchGate, which are already recruiting using our platform - just create an account and you'll be able to post your jobs.

If you want to know more before trying it out, feel free to email me at alvin.stanescu@lunarcareers.com or PM me here on HN.

Thanks, Alvin
